articles.description: Union workers locked out of their jobs at a Texas oil refinery for nearly 10 months voted on Monday by a nearly two-thirds margin to accept an Exxon Mobil Corp contract offer, a union official said.
articles.content: BEAUMONT, Texas - Union workers locked out of their jobs at a Texas oil refinery for nearly 10 months voted on Monday by a nearly two-thirds margin to accept an Exxon Mobil Corp contract offer, a uni… [+2419 chars]

articles.title: What’s the most overpriced used car in Florida? - WFLA
articles.description: Used car prices are at record highs in the wake of the microchip shortage.

articles.author: Gabriela Miranda, USA TODAY
articles.title: Restaurant employees given $61,000 after managers caught dipping into tip pool, federal agency says - USA TODAY
articles.description: A U.S. Department of Labor investigation found New Hampshire restaurant managers were dipping into their employees' tip pool.
articles.content: The U.S. Department of Labor recovered thousands in tips for employees at a New Hampshire restaurant where managers improperly took their own cuts from the employee tip pool, the department's Wage an… [+1377 chars]
